body:
Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) posted earnings of $0.61/Share in the previous quarter, as compared to earnings of $0.6/share estimated by analysts. The difference between the estimated and actual earnings was $0.01 per share.

Among analysts who offered their Analysis on Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL)—8 analysts issued Strong buy for the stock, 14 analysts have given a Buy rating, 13 think it’s a HOLD, 3 reported it as Underperform, while 0 analyst issued a Sell rating. (These Recommendations are reported by Yahoo Finance and are only for the Current Month)

Growth Estimate for Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) is projected at -3.1 percent in the Current Quarter and -3.7 percent in the Next Quarter, according to analysts. The growth estimate for the next five years is 8.46 percent (per annum). Comparatively, growth in the past five years was 0.08 percent (per annum).

A number of analysts offered their Estimated Earnings analysis for Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) for the current quarter. 30 analysts projected on average Earnings. The High end of the forecast is $0.63/share, while the Low end is $0.55/share.

Average Revenue Estimate for the current quarter is $8.99 Billion, according to consensus forecast of 27 analysts. The High end of the Estimate is $9.15 Billion, while the Low end of the Estimate is $8.78 Billion. The company had Year Ago Sales of $9.08 Billion.

Price Target plays a critical role when it comes to the Analysis of a Stock. 36 Analysts think that the Price Target for Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) might hit $43.5, however, the High Price Target and Low price Target are $52 and $25, respectively.

Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) share price Jumped 0.25% to reach $40.23 during the last trading session. The Market Cap of the company stands at 162.31 Billion. The stock has 52-week high of $42 and 52-week low of $34.47. The stock’s current distance from 20-Day Simple Moving Average (SMA20) is 2.83% where SMA50 and SMA200 are 2.12% and 1.67% respectively. The stock hit its 52-Week High on Mar 21, 2016 and 52-Week Low on Feb 11, 2016.

The Average Volume of the company is 9.23 Million, while the Relative Volume of the company is 0.71. The company’s P/E is 19.29 and Forward P/E ratio is 14.39.

Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) shows its Return on Assets (ROA) value of 7.6 percent, while the Return on Equity (ROE) value is 18.7 percent and Return on Investment (ROI) value stands at 11.2 percent. The company’s Relative strength index is 62.75.

3 analysts rated the stock of Express Scripts Holding Company (NASDAQ:ESRX) as ‘STRONG BUY’, 6 rated as ‘BUY’ and 13 issued a ‘HOLD’ rating. The score shows the rating on a scale of 1 to 5, where 1=strong buy and 5=strong sell. The highest and lowest price target given by the brokerage firms to the equity are $95 and $59, respectively. The mean price target is $81.11 (according to consensus of 17 analysts).

Express Scripts Holding Company (NASDAQ:ESRX) fell -3.25 percent over the past one year, while it declined -1.74 percent year to date (YTD). The stock tumbled -11.15 percent over the last 6 months. The company’s quarterly performance represents an optimistic momentum of 3.84 percent, with a decline of -1.74 percent in the stock price over the last one month.

The stock is now trading at a distance of -4.84% from SMA-20. The stock is currently trading -6.9 percent higher from its SMA-50. Express Scripts Holding Company (NASDAQ:ESRX) has a Return on Assets of 5.3 percent, Return on Equity of 17.4 percent, while Return on Investment of 9 percent.

The company is expected to report earnings of 1.35 per share for the current quarter, according to consensus agreement of 17 analysts. The high end of the earnings forecast is $1.51 per share and low end is $1.31 per share.

Express Scripts Holding Company (NASDAQ:ESRX) is expected to report revenue of $25.45 Billion for the current quarter, according to consensus estimate of 14 analysts. The high end of the revenue guidance is $26.58 Billion and the low end is $24.87 Billion.

Express Scripts Holding Company’s growth estimate for the current quarter is 19.9, and 10.7 percent for the next quarter. Expected growth of Express Scripts Holding Company (NASDAQ:ESRX) for the next year 5 years is 13.36 percent (per annum), as compared to 15.11 percent (per annum) in the past 5 years.
title: Hot Trending Stocks: Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL), Express Scripts Holding Company (NASDAQ:ESRX) | The Ripon Advance
